name: Firefox theme: Gradius [Fx 29+/Linux]
description:
A simple Firefox theme with linear, matte gradients. Fully compatible with lightweight themes/Personas, and now with color customization. Linux only; untested on Windows and macOS/OS X. Windows platform testing done under Wine 1.9.x.

Derived from style 131381.
